snippet.title: Tails: The Backbone Preludes - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Tails: The Backbone Preludes is a prequel post-noir narrative adventure game. The game is filled with branching choices focused on a series of vignettes about coming of age, circumstance, and the consequences of it all. Guide four diverse characters through formative moments in their lives, all set to the backdrop of a gorgeously pixelated dystopian Vancouver inhabited by anthropomorphic animals. Tails: The Backbone Preludes is available now on PC.
